content.question: How is the sentence translated?

choices.label: We were sitting while talking to the women who had come together.
The women were sitting and talking where they had come together.
We were talking to the women who were sitting where they had come together.
And while sitting, we were talking to the women who had come together.

content.answer: And while sitting, we were talking to the women who had come together.

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
